item.description:
DATE:  Sunday, Dec 9th
TIME:  1:00pm
TITLE:  1/1 NL Hold Em Cash Game
LOCATION:  2 Omelia Rd, Broad Brook
PHONE:  860-597-3776

DETAILS:  Buyin for as little as $30, up to $150 or anything in-between.  Working on getting a dedicated dealer, my game is not raked so dealers work on tips!  Seats are first-come first-served, but you can hang around for a seat to open up if the game fills.

BYOB and any food/snacks you want for yourself or to share.  I'll be cooking up some Digiorno's pizza and if you want some please toss a couple bucks to help defray the costs.

We have a game-funded bad beat jackpot.  Current qualifier is losing with Queens full and prize pool is $100.

Game is 100% non-smoking (including outside, it just comes back in)
Please park near my silver Camry, but not on the grass!
Enter house through deck on side
Guests must remove outdoor shoes and leave on shoe racks in the laundry room (i.e. bring slippers or thick socks)
We have two kittens in case you're allergic, they are both very friendly

Don't forget the $1.00 to offset the organizer site fees.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: 1/1 NL Hold Em Cash Game
